short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A simple Chrome extension that displays a joke.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Introducing SimplyA Joke! 

Elevate your daily experience with a touch of humor, now just a click away. Delight in a plethora of dad jokes to brighten your day, whether you're taking a break from the daily grind or simply seeking a chuckle. 

Install SimplyA Joke now and let the laughter flow!
